about_the_game:
Later Alligator is a point-and-click adventure game, set in the lively, hand-animated world of Alligator New York City. Featuring tons of minigames, fun secrets, and a super duper secret ending, help Pat the hapless alligator through his family's sinister plot. Fully animated by SmallBu Animation Studio (the mad geniuses behind Baman Piderman), Later Alligator is available on PC/Mac/Linux.

The Later Alligator demo features one full area of the game. Play pinball against a cool pinhead, master a claw machine filled with goodies, or hey, just hang around and meet some weirdos.
detailed_description:
Later Alligator is a point-and-click adventure game, set in the lively, hand-animated world of Alligator New York City. Featuring tons of minigames, fun secrets, and a super duper secret ending, help Pat the hapless alligator through his family's sinister plot. Fully animated by SmallBu Animation Studio (the mad geniuses behind Baman Piderman), Later Alligator is available on PC/Mac/Linux.

The Later Alligator demo features one full area of the game. Play pinball against a cool pinhead, master a claw machine filled with goodies, or hey, just hang around and meet some weirdos.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+ or equivalent (64-bit only)
  • Processor: 2+ Ghz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750M or equivalent with vendor-supplied drivers
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional, but recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.11+
  • Processor: 2+ Ghz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750M or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional, but recommended

name: Later Alligator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit (Media Feature Pack required on Windows N)
  • Processor: 2+ Ghz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750M or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional, but recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A quirky point-and-click adventure game with funny dialogue, minigames, and many many alligators in a fully animated explorable world.
